title: unboxing Acer Chromebook CB3-131
description:
Hello again! I am back with another unboxing video, this time the Acer Chromebook CB3-131.

Some quick and brief specs on this one:

Intel Celeron Processor model N2840
Dual-Core 2.16 Ghz CPU
2GB RAM (memory, DDR3 type)
SD card reader
Storage: 16GB (flash - like SSD drive, sort of)
11.6" screen
LCD display (IPS technology), HD
1366x768 resolution
Wireless a/b/g/n/ac
Microphone
Camera
2 USB ports (1 is USB 3)
HDMI port
3490 mAh battery
2.43 lbs (not heavy at all!).
